text: I got the weirdest question today on

when I should start applying for jobs I
feel nervous like I'm not gonna do good
and I won't get the job now I see this

worried to take a leap for a job or they
feel like they're too inexperienced to

start over again this is how I would
prepare myself to get a job in all

CSS make myself as employable as

tic-tac-toe do it application with a

with experience usually comes confidence

interviewing is a skill in of itself and

of jobs awesome I can use those to
negotiate with each other

improve on those things second I would
always be very careful about the jobs

that would kind of be how I would

where you get hired first and then the

completely different than you thought
I'm 36 years old and I still keep
